commands.name: az pipelines pool list
commands.syntax:
az pipelines pool list [--action {manage, none, use}]
                       [--detect {false, true}]
                       [--org]
                       [--pool-name]
                       [--pool-type {automation, deployment}]

commands.name: az pipelines pool show
commands.syntax:
az pipelines pool show --id
                       [--action {manage, none, use}]
                       [--detect {false, true}]
                       [--org]
